roleset.name: hold, support weight
roleset.note: WEIGHTBEAR-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to weightbearing.01 and bear.01. Framed by Katie. (from weightbear.01-v)
WEIGHTBEARING-N NOTES: relation to bear.01 (from weightbearing.01-n)

example.name: arg 1 will be unlikely
example.text: He has been weightbearing as tolerated in street shoes.
